results.definition: value measured by what must be given or done or undergone to obtain something
examples: the price of success is hard work

results.definition: the property of having material worth (often indicated by the amount of money something would bring if sold)
examples: he puts a high price on his services

results.definition: the amount of money needed to purchase something
a monetary reward for helping to catch a criminal
examples: the cattle thief has a price on his head

results.definition: ascertain or learn the price of
examples: Have you priced personal computers lately?
they say that every politician has a price
The grocer priced his wares high

results.definition: the high value or worth of something
examples: her price is far above rubies
